body_html: TopK on the GPU is now implemented using CUB's radix sort, so should be about as fast as is possible even when k == N. CPU uses std::sort as well for k == N. So I'm going to close this issue.
body_text: TopK on the GPU is now implemented using CUB's radix sort, so should be about as fast as is possible even when k == N.  CPU uses std::sort as well for k == N.  So I'm going to close this issue.
